hero.title: Nyx Foundation
hero.subtitle: Build a Verifiable Future for Open Innovation

research.title: Research
research.description: We conduct cutting-edge research and development in distributed systems and cryptographic technologies. Our work spans from fundamental research to implementation in blockchain, zero-knowledge proofs, and multi-party computation.

whitehat.title: Whitehat Hacking
whitehat.description: Contributing to the improvement of digital infrastructure security through discovery and responsible disclosure of security vulnerabilities. We participate in bug bounty programs and conduct independent vulnerability research.

verification.title: Formal Verification
verification.description: Using mathematical methods to prove the correctness and security of smart contracts, protocols, and cryptographic algorithms.

education.title: Education
education.description: Committed to nurturing the next generation of researchers and engineers. We share cutting-edge technical knowledge through workshops, seminars, and online courses.

house.title: House
house.description: Operating a community space for researchers and innovators. We provide a physical hub for idea exchange, collaboration, and experimentation.

step1.title: Connect your wallet
step1.description: Scan the QR code with a WalletConnect-compatible wallet to link your address. Once you're connected, the check mark will turn green.
step1.fiatDescription: WalletConnect is not required for bank transfers. Skip this step and continue to Step 3.

step2.label: Step 3
step2.title: Send your donation
step2.description: Press Donate to send the transaction. After it succeeds we'll guide you to the thank-you page to register your leaderboard name and icon.
step2.fiatDescription: Complete your bank transfer, then press the “Done” button below so we can reconcile your donation.
